TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you forget it a split second later.

I wish for a telescope.

Granted, but it doesn't work

I wish I had MOAR PUGZ

Granted,they die after 50 seconds wiping out half the population out off all the pugs in the universe.

i wish Pugspaceprogram would stop asking pug things.

Granted, now he asks about corgi things. CORGIS 4 LYFE

I wish for a dubstep cannon.

Granted, your ears have just exploded.

I wish i had a Corgi!No,2 Corgi's!3 CORGI'S!!!!!!

Granted, but they transform into PUG5

I wish all Corgis were nuked.

Granted, but they all prepared for this and all of them move into the Cheyenne Mountain nuclear bunker to prepare for the strike. They all survive, and start a grand invasion of the pugland

I wish for a anti-pug raygun.

Granted, but there was a shipping error that got you an anti anti-pug raygun (essentially a pug gun)

I wish when I pressed backspace, a corgi was deleted from the universe.

Granted but you also delete a pug too

I wish the next person turns into a used peice of toilet paper

Granted but humans are not wood. (Although, they are carbon-based lifeforms.)

I wish an ace could cause the universe to explode

Granted, but after he completes the task, whats left of the universe is affected by him, causing the new universe to become a giant Mobius strip. What, you did ask for a ace, and that ace was Mobius 1 from, again, Ace Combat 4. :sticktongue:

I wish for a kerbal made lightsaber.

Edited August 13, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but it doesn't work and just explodes.

I wish things would happen

Granted, all pugs just died.

I wish for Corgi's had their own Space Program.

Granted, but we all know what will happen when they meet their puggy rivals...

I wish someone would let the cat out of the bag already.

Granted, but it's SchrÃƒÂ¶dinger's cat, and it's dead

I wish someone would leave the corgi in the bag

Granted but then a hundred pugs die for that corgi

I wish my little pony was never created

granted but then my little horse is created

i wish that you hadn't stole'd my name and that my name or my wish or anything bad that would endanger my life would not happen

you mad?

Just Not granted (Read the rules)

I wish Isaac Armstrong's grammar would improve.

Granted just granted

I wish I had a nuke with millions of pugs tied to it

Granted, it is aimed at the president and you are responsible.

I wish for more wishes.

granted, but they are all corrupt

I wish Pugs and Corgis could just get along

Granted, they get along rather well now, except for the fact that they now have random muscle spasms that cause them to fling their ever present deadly weapons at eachother.

I wish for a fast car.

granted but you got a giant tutle

i wish for cake

Granted,its a LIE!A FILTHY FILTHY LIE!

I wish for to die 5 minutes before my death.

granted but you never die

I wish for you to be good at life
